nodes.text: The Thalak was a tribe of Gormak operating in the Nightmare Lands of Voss during the Cold War.

During the Cold War the Voss, concerned about the Thalak, tasked a Republic strike team with reducing their capabilities. The tribe's trained Mawvorr and Vorantikus were slained alongside the tribesman. The Chieftain was also killed.
The Thalak are the enemies of the heroic mission Not Afraid Enough in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
